title: Thanks riot
body: Thanks riot. you officially ruined U.R.F by making it A.R. you really know how to F**k up a game mode.

replies.body: Nah its better now. Git gud nub

Ooo u got me good hahaha.

Least nubs cant just spam the same 5 champs every game now. Feels good.

as much as I love shen in regular games, he's probably among the worst champions in URF. Sometimes you get a fun champion who can abuse the cdr and limitless mana (galio, sona, ezreal, brand, hecarim, evelynn, ect...). other times you get champions who are actually slightly weaker in urf due to enemy mobility being on steroids (rammus), shield scalings being halved (shen) and resource-less champions that are generally supposed to try to use that to their advantage but now can't compete (rumble, yasou) with low cdr mana champions that can now spam abilities.

urf is boring asf after about 4 games

arurf should atleast last 8.
t. a motherfucker who picks zed every game
